data.title: Austin Butler Net Worth 2024 (His ‘Elvis’ Salary Revealed)
data.meta_description: Austin Butler is an American actor, singer, and model with a net worth of $4 million. He is best known for playing Elvis Presley in the 2022 movie "Elvis".
data.text:
Austin Butler Net Worth: Austin Butler is an American actor born on August 17, 1991, in Anaheim, California. As of 2024, Austin Butler net worth currently stands at $4 Million after he earned $70,000 from the movie ‘Elvis’.

Austin Butler began his career as a child actor, appearing in Nickelodeon and Disney Channel shows like “Zoey 101” and “Hannah Montana.” Butler gained further recognition for his roles in “The Carrie Diaries” and “The Shannara Chronicles”.

Butler’s breakout role came when he portrayed Elvis Presley in Baz Luhrmann’s 2022 biopic “Elvis,” earning him critical acclaim and an Academy Award nomination. He continues to expand his filmography with significant roles, including Feyd-Rautha in the highly anticipated “Dune: Part Two”.

His net worth has left us impressed. The actor who has fairly struggled to get popular roles today has a whopping net worth that will leave you all amazed! The salary that he earned for his role as “Elvis” has finally been revealed and we’re in shock for real to know how good the amount is! Here we’ll talk about Austin net worth in 2024 including his salary in biopics of Elvis Presley.

What is Austin Butler net worth?

Austin Butler is an American actor, singer, and model with a net worth of $4 million. He is best known for playing Elvis Presley in the 2022 movie “Elvis” directed by Baz Luhrmann. Before this role, he was in many TV shows like “Zoey 101,” “Ruby & the Rockits,” “Life Unexpected,” “The Carrie Diaries,” and “The Shannara Chronicles.” Butler has also appeared in movies such as “Dude,” “The Dead Don’t Die,” and “Once Upon a Time in Hollywood.”

Also Check – Austin Butler Movies and TV Shows

Austin Butler Net Worth Highlights

Austin Butler

Net Worth $4 Million Birthdate Aug 17, 1991 (32 years old) Birthplace Anaheim Gender Male Height 6 ft (1.83 m) Profession Actor, Singer Nationality United States of America

How Much Did Austin Butler Make for Elvis?

The breakthrough performance of Austin as Elvis stunned the audiences and how! Be it the body language, the accent, or the voice, the actor did everything he could to perfect the role. People got highly confused about how he managed to sing in the exact voice of the singer. For the film that got an Oscar nomination, Elvis was paid a whopping amount of $700,000!

Austin Butler’s Career

Austin has also worked in numerous television shows and films before appearing as “Elvis Presley” in the biopic Elvis.

Television Career

Austin’s first extended role was in Ned’s Declassified School Survival Guide as Lionel Scranton which aired on Nickelodeon. After that, he landed the role of Derek Hanson opposite Miley Cyrus in the famous teen show Hannah Montana. He went on to play such guest roles and side characters in several shows like “Zoey 101,” “Ruby & the Rockits,” “Life Unexpected,” “The Carrie Diaries,” and “The Shannara Chronicles.”

In 2011, he landed a lead role as Zack Garvey in the Lifetime TV television movie called The Bling Ring. One of his biggest roles was in the year 2013 when he was approached to play the role of Sebastian Kydd on the “Sex and the City” prequel series “The Carrie Diaries.”

Film Career

In 2009. Austin first appeared in a feature film “Aliens in the Attic” alongside Ashley Tisdale. He further acted with Tisdale in the High school musical spinoff film “Sharpay’s Fabulous Adventure”. He played a prominent role in “The Intruders,” a horror film that came back in 2015. In 2018, he also starred in the Netflix film “Dude”.

It was in 2019 when he grabbed roles in two great films by renowned filmmakers. He starred in Quentin Tarantino’s alternate-history dramedy “Once Upon a Time in Hollywood” and Jim Jarmusch’s zombie comedy “The Dead Don’t Die”.

His most valuable performance and the most recognized role in the film “Elvis” which was released in the year 2022 earned him appreciation and accolades from across the world. He landed the role after singing the rendition of “Unchained Melody” wearing a bathrobe in the audition video which highly left a mark on the director Baz Luhrmann’s mind that there’s something unique about him.

He is also going to be a part of Dune Part 2, which is an upcoming movie co-starring Zendaya, Florence Pugh, Rebecca Ferguson, Timothée Chalamet, and several other talented actors.

Conclusion

Austin Butler has made a significant impact in the entertainment industry as an actor, singer, and model. With a net worth of $4 million, Butler has gained fame through various roles on television and in films. His standout performance as Elvis Presley in Baz Luhrmann’s 2022 biographical film “Elvis” has solidified his status as a talented and versatile actor. Early in his career, he appeared in popular TV shows like “Zoey 101,” “Ruby & the Rockits,” “Life Unexpected,” “The Carrie Diaries,” and “The Shannara Chronicles.” Additionally, he has been featured in notable films such as “Dude,” “The Dead Don’t Die,” and “Once Upon a Time in Hollywood.”

Butler continues to build on his success, taking on challenging roles and earning recognition for his dedication to his craft. As he advances in his career, his net worth and influence in the industry are likely to grow, making him a prominent figure in Hollywood.
